Generated documentation from the QE-MTS paper and the tutorial notebook.

| **[TUTORIAL-NOTEBOOK-GUIDE.md](TUTORIAL-NOTEBOOK-GUIDE.md)** | `tutorial_notebook/01_quantum_enhanced_optimization_LABS.ipynb` | Section-by-section guide: LABS, MTS, DCQO kernels (2/4-qubit blocks), G2/G4, full Trotter circuit, quantum vs random seeding, self-validation, exercise checklist. |

**Paper:** Gomez Cadavid et al., “Scaling advantage with quantum-enhanced memetic tabu search for LABS,” arXiv:2511.04553v1 (Nov 2025).
